org.jpws.front

Class PwsafeJ

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • org.jpws.front.PwsafeJ
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class PwsafeJ
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The "mainframe" of this application. Holds the static "main()" function (which only branches into Global class for startup routines).
    Author:
    Wolfgang Keller
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
